About Me

I am a senior undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science and Technology. My previous research focus was on high-performance computing, and now I am focusing on deep generative models, occasionally paying attention to AI Infra work. Recently, I have been learning and exploring the field of diffusion models, hoping to publish a good paper in the future. At the same time, I am also considering whether to pursue a Ph.D. or enter the workforce in the future. Although it’s not yet time to make a decision, I should think about it in advance to have better options. I also welcome fellow students who are similarly undecided to discuss this with me.

I don’t have any sophisticated hobbies. In my spare time, I enjoy traveling, music, and games. Traveling to unfamiliar places can bring a lot of freshness, and I hope to visit every province in China before my student days end, and also travel around the world as much as possible. In terms of music, I mainly listen to Japanese music (but not JPOP), and I have been a fan of Yuki Kajiura (Fiction Junction) and Kokia for many years. This album records the LIVE shows I’ve attended. Living is all about sustainably attending more LIVE shows. As for games, I used to play a lot, but recently I haven’t had much time due to my studies. I have tried many types of games in the past, and I want to list some of my favorites (I’ve wanted to do this for a long time), such as the Type-Moon series (FGO/Mahoutsukai no Yoru/Tsukihime), the Final Fantasy series (VII/XIV/XV), the Pokémon series (Sword and Shield/Scarlet and Violet/Arceus/ZA), etc. I’ve also played quite a few FPS and MOBA games, but I’m not very good at them.

About the Site

This site is built with Hugo and uses the Stack theme (v3.33.0) with modifications. It is hosted on GitHub Pages and uses Alibaba Cloud CDN for domain distribution. The comment system is supported by Utterances.

The site was officially established on 2024/11/23 and underwent a “remake” at the beginning of 2026. The posts and comments from the old blog have been archived here. I will write and upload (or update previous posts) whenever I have time, and I will also update the blog style based on some needs during my continuous exploration (but I won’t spend too much effort on it, as front-end development is not my main focus).
